content.query:
create database SourceViewsDb

use SourceViewsDb

create view vTransactionDetails 
as
select * 
  from 
    openrowset(
        bulk  'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/andyrob/raw/RetailTransactionDetails.csv'
        , format = 'CSV'
        , parser_version ='2.0'
        , header_row = true
    ) txndetails
GO

create view vTransactionHeader
as
select * 
  from 
    openrowset(
        bulk  'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/andyrob/raw/RetailTransactionHeader.csv'
        , format = 'CSV'
        , parser_version ='2.0'
        , header_row = true
    ) txnheader
go

create view vCustomer
as
select * 
  from 
    openrowset(
        bulk  'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/andyrob/raw/RetailTransactionHeader.csv'
        , format = 'CSV'
        , parser_version ='2.0'
        , header_row = true
    ) txnheader
go




select top 10 * from vTransactionDetails
select top 10 * from vTransactionHeader
